value: U 1 63 Wells Rd, Chelsea Heights, 3196, VIC, Australia

3841 - Surgical and Medical Instruments and Apparatus Summary > LIVANOVA AUSTRALIA PTY LIMITED is an Australian proprietary company. Its operations cover surgical and medical instruments and apparatus. The company is involved in the import and export of goods. LIVANOVA AUSTRALIA PTY LIMITED is headquartered in Chelsea Heights, Victoria. It is headed by chief executive officer Damien Mcdonald. For the 2024 financial year, the company reported revenue of $39.26 million. Its net profit totalled $267,000. LIVANOVA AUSTRALIA PTY LIMITED forms part of the manufacturing industry sector.
